text: Robert Blatt (November 3, 1921 - July 5, 1994) was an American alpine skier. He competed in two events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1994 deaths Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Norfolk, Virginia Category:Stanford University alumni
title: Robert Blatt
